body_text: The "Return a promise" bit reads weirdly to me, compared to other methods here that return promises and use @promises instead. I'm more interested that it hashes data, and what "truncated" means (as in truncated to 12 characters). I think you should reword this.
body: The "Return a promise" bit reads weirdly to me, compared to other methods here that return promises and use `@promises` instead. I'm more interested that it hashes data, and what "truncated" means (as in truncated to 12 characters). I think you should reword this.
body_html: The "Return a promise" bit reads weirdly to me, compared to other methods here that return promises and use @promises instead. I'm more interested that it hashes data, and what "truncated" means (as in truncated to 12 characters). I think you should reword this.
